### Create a recipe using `recipe_scale_center()`
`recipe_scale_center()` creates a recipe and also scales and centers all the predictors in the given formula.
For example, we can create a recipe using `mpg` has the target and `hp` and `cyl` as the predictors.

```{r recipe-scale-center}
recipe_scale_center(mtcars, mpg ~ hp + cyl)
```
